"Yuri": "Ah! You gave some items to the Regional Mag? Good, now you should be able to handle the cold a bit better!"
"Key words here being \"a bit\". That boost alone won't completely protect you from the cold, so keep that in mind."
"Maybe you could give items to the other Regional Mags or something?"
"Anyways, good luck out there. I'm rootin' for ya!"
